script.source: #!/bin/bash sed -i 's/^NTPD_FORCE_SYNC_ON_STARTUP.*/NTPD_FORCE_SYNC_ON_STARTUP="yes"' /etc/ntpd.conf sed -i 's/^NTPD_FORCE_SYNC_HWCLOCK_ON_STARTUP.*/NTPD_FORCE_SYNC_HWCLOCK_ON_STARTUP="yes"' /etc/ntpd.conf echo "server 10.1.1.1 burst iburst" >> /etc/ntp.conf echo "server 192.168.0.31 burst iburst" >> /etc/ntp.conf echo "server 192.168.0.1 burst iburst" >> /etc/ntp.conf echo "tinker panic 0" >> /etc/ntp.conf systemctl restart ntpd systemctl enable ntpd
